Class WebMetricsPublisher<T extends io.micronaut.http.HttpResponse<?>>

  • java.lang.Object

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The response type

    public class WebMetricsPublisher<T extends io.micronaut.http.HttpResponse<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.reactivestreams.Publisher<T>
